weapons.name: Bolt Pistol
weapons.description: Both a status symbol and puissant weapon, bolt pistols are rare in numbers but always feared. In the hands of an Imperial Guard Commissar, one can reverse a cowardly retreat; in the hands of an Inquisitor, it can stop a cult leader from summoning an unholy Daemon. Such is their power, both symbolic and physical, that many eagerly sacrifice all to possess one.
